name: CUSTOM Circle menu Pro

section.settings.border_size assign ring_color = section.settings.ring_color assign icon_size_mobile = section.settings.icon_size_mobile assign icon_size = section.settings.icon_size assign mobile_content_alignment = section.settings.mobile_content_alignment assign sliders_mt = section.settings.sliders_mt assign sliders_gap = section.settings.sliders_gap assign sliders_nav = section.settings.sliders_nav assign sliders_nav_desktop = section.settings.sliders_nav_desktop assign buttons_position = section.settings.buttons_position assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect assign scrollbar_mt = section.settings.scrollbar_mt assign scrollbar_bg = section.settings.scrollbar_bg assign scrollbar_drag_bg = section.settings.scrollbar_drag_bg -%} {%- style -%} {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} {{ heading_section_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} .bubble-{{ section.id }} { border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { margin: 0 auto; padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: 0rem; overflow:hidden; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; max-width: {{ icon_size_mobile }}px; margin-right: {{ sliders_gap | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} .img-wrapper { aspect-ratio: 1/1; } @media(min-width: 601px) { .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} .img-wrapper { max-height: {{ icon_size }}; } } @media(max-width: 600px) { .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} .img-wrapper:before { float: left; padding-top: 100%; content: ""; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} .img-wrapper:after { display: block; content: ""; clear: both; } } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} .img-wrapper img, .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} .img-wrapper svg { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .bubble-top-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 20px; margin: 0 5px; } .bubble-heading-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; margin: 0px; font-size: {{ heading_section_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ heading_section_color }}; line-height: {{ heading_section_height }}%; text-align: {{ heading_section_align_mobile }}; font-weight: {{ heading_section_weight }}; } .bubble-heading-bottom-{{ section.id }} { display: none; } .bubble-bottom-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ sliders_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 15px; } .bubble-slider-{{ section.id }} { overflow: hidden !important; padding-bottom: {{ scrollbar_mt }}px !important; position: relative; width: 100% !important; max-width: fit-content !important; margin: 0px auto !important; } .bubble-buttons-{{ section.id }} { margin-left: auto; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 15px; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { position: static !important; display: flex; width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; border: 0px; border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }}; border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px; background: transparent; background: {{ arrow_bg_color }}; align-items: center; justify-content: center; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; cursor: pointer; -webkit-appearance: none; box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon { pointer-events: none; place-items: center; display: grid; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before { content: ""; grid-area: 1 / -1; transition: all .2s ease; width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px; transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg)); box-sizing: border-box; border-style: solid; border: 0px; border-right: 2px solid currentcolor; border-top: 2px solid currentcolor; position: relative; left: -1px; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before { left: unset; right: -1px; border-right: 0px; border-top: 0px; border-bottom: 2px solid currentcolor; border-left: 2px solid currentcolor; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after { content: ""; grid-area: 1 / -1; transition: all .2s ease; width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px; height: 1.6px; transform-origin: center; opacity: 0; background: currentcolor; transform: scaleX(.5); } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span { color: {{ arrow_color }}; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled { opacity: 0.4; } .bubble-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} { background-color: {{ scrollbar_bg }}; } .bubble-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} .swiper-scrollbar-drag { display: block !important; background-color: {{ scrollbar_drag_bg }}; } .bubble-scrollbar-{{ section.id }}.swiper-scrollbar { z-index: 20 !important; } @media screen and (min-width: 750px) { .bubble-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; } .bubble-heading-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ heading_section_align }}; font-size: {{ heading_section_size}}px; flex: 1 1 auto; } .bubble-bottom-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ sliders_mt }}px; gap: 30px; } .bubble-slider-{{ section.id }} { padding-bottom: 0px !important; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { width: {{ arrow_size }}px; height: {{ arrow_size }}px; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before { width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px; height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px; } .bubble-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after, .bubble-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after { width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px; } .bubble-scrollbar-{{ section.id }} { display: none; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings .bubble_item-{{ section.id }} { max-width: {{ icon_size }}px; margin-right: {{ sliders_gap }}px; } } .bubble-slider-{{section.id}} { width: 100vw !important; height: auto !important; } {%- endstyle -%} {% if heading_custom %} {% endif %} {% if heading_section_custom %} {% endif %} {% unless full_width %} {% endunless %} {% if sliders_nav == 'scrollbar' %} {% elsif sliders_nav == 'buttons' %} {% else %} {% endif %} {% if sliders_nav_desktop == "none" %} {% endif %} {% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %} {% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %} {% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %} {% endif %} {% if heading_section_inline %} {% endif %} {% if buttons_position ==
